location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Colonel Richard A Willis, Town Major, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing him that a detachment of the Poona [Pune] auxilliary horse which had previously formed part of the Escort to the Envoy to the Court of Persia was returning to Bombay on board the MahmudyBuglow. Also enclosed with the letter is:Embarkation return of a detachment of the Poona [Pune] Auxilliary Horse returning to India from the Escort of Lieutenant Colonel Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia, Bushire Residency, 27 December 1826
